title: Build comprehensive fitness tracking web app
description: ✅ COMPLETED — Full fitness tracker with: calorie intake tracking (breakfast/lunch/dinner/snacks), workout logging with weight tracking for strength exercises, exercise database (cardio/strength/bodyweight/flexibility/sports), custom food creation & saving, calendar navigation with historical data, daily notes. Running on http://localhost:3334. No persistent highlight on calendar clicks. Server: fitness-app/server.js (Express on port 3334).

title: Deep dive product research with logical reasoning for drop shipping
description: ✅ COMPLETED — Deep dive product research with 8 winning products analyzed: Peeling Facial Serum (83% margin), Magnetic Gym Bottle Bag (80%), Facial Ice Bath Bowl (75%), Bluetooth Smart Sunglasses (75%), Rain Cloud Aroma Diffuser (75%), Hidden Love Projection Necklace (80%), Roulette Watch (72%), Red Light Therapy Belt (70%). Each includes: why it wins, target audience, profit margins, direct supplier links (AliExpress, CJ Dropshipping, Alibaba, Spocket, etc.), and marketing angles. Plus strategic recommendations for beginners. Full report: dropship-product-research-2026.md

title: Daily stock briefing (8am PST)
description:
3 cron jobs run daily at 8:00/8:05/8:10 AM PST:
1) Portfolio briefing — prices, changes, earnings alerts
2) Watchlist briefing — same treatment
3) Market insights — sector rotations, opportunities, trends

All post to /api/stocks endpoints and send summaries to Telegram.

title: Research: AI smart scale for calorie tracking
description:
✅ COMPLETED — PDF report saved to research/ai-smart-scale-research-2026.pdf and pushed to jarvis-builds.

KEY FINDINGS:
• Direct competitor found: Qalzy (UK, ex-Microsoft team) launched on Kickstarter May 2025 at $169-280. Same concept — scale + camera + OpenAI.
• Market: Smart kitchen TAM $60B+ by 2030 (16-18% CAGR). SOM for AI nutrition scales: $500M-3B.
• AI accuracy: 94.2% for common foods (Stanford 2025). Struggles with mixed meals, sauces, liquids.
• Pain point validated: 72% of MFP users cite database inaccuracy, ~65% dropout rate within months.
• Business model: $179 hardware + $9.99/mo sub → LTV:CAC of 4.2:1 at target scenario.
• Patent risk: US10502614B2 covers scale+camera+food recognition — needs FTO analysis.
• Verdict: CONDITIONALLY GO. Differentiate via build-a-bowl workflow, superior design, US-first launch, B2B clinical channel.

title: Build insider trading tracker
description: Built insider trading tracker: Backend API (GET/POST/DELETE /api/stocks/insiders + /summary cluster detection), fetch-insiders.js script (SEC EDGAR Form 4 XML parsing, dedup, filters P/S transactions only), Dashboard UI with Insider tab (summary cards, cluster alerts, filterable transaction table). Populated with 145 real transactions. Clusters detected: FCX 4 insiders selling $34M, CRWV 2 insiders selling $25.3M.

title: Daily insider trading scan (8:15am PST)
description: Cron job runs fetch-insiders.js daily at 8:15am PST (after stock briefing). Fetches new SEC Form 4 filings, alerts via Telegram only for notable activity (insider buys, large sells, cluster activity).
